## Finding derivative expression and slope

```{r}
# A
fx = expression(x ^ 2)

dfdx = D(fx, 'x')

x = 3

eval(dfdx)
```

```{r}
# B 
Pa = expression(2 * (3 * a + 2) ^ 4 - 5)

dPda = D(Pa, 'a')

a = 1.2

eval(dPda)
```
